      • getNumberOfPlayers

        public static int getNumberOfPlayers()
        Asks the user for the number of players
        Returns:
        the number of players

      • getNumberOfTeams

        public static int getNumberOfTeams(int noOfPlayers)
        Asks the user whether this is a collaborative game or not and if yes, the number of teams
        Parameters:
        noOfPlayers - the total number of players in the game
        Returns:
        the number of teams, this is equal to the number of players if it's a solo game

      • getMapSize

        public static int getMapSize()
        Prompts the user for the map size and returns it
        Returns:
        the map size given by the user. Gurantees a legal amount

      • getMap

        public static Map getMap(int mapSize)
        Prompts the user for the map type and returns the generated map
        Parameters:
        mapSize - the map size
        Returns:
        the generated map.

      • createTeamList

        public static Team[] createTeamList(int numOfTeams,
                                    int mapSize)
        Creates the list of teams
        Parameters:
        numOfTeams - the number of teams required
        mapSize - the preferred map size
        Returns:
        a list of teams

      • createPlayerList

        public static Player[] createPlayerList(int numOfPlayers,
                                        int mapSize,
                                        Team[] teams)
        Creates the player lists and randomly assigns every player a team.
        Parameters:
        numOfPlayers - the number of players that will be playing
        mapSize - the size of the map that is used
        teams - the teams to put the players in
        Returns:
        the list of players

      • generateHTMLFiles

        public static void generateHTMLFiles(Team[] teams,
                                     Player[] players)
        Generates Game HTML Files for each player
        Parameters:
        teams - the list of teams
        players - the list of players

      • getNextMove

        private static void getNextMove(Player player,
                                int playerIndex)
        Validates the next move for the player currently in play
        Parameters:
        player - the player currently playing
        playerIndex - the index of the player currently playing

      • getLandingTile

        protected static char getLandingTile(Player player,
                                     Map map)
        Gets the tile type the user landed on
        Parameters:
        player - the player who's playing
        map - the map used
        Returns:
        the tile type

      • setNumPlayers

        public static boolean setNumPlayers(int n)
        Checks that the number of playerList is valid
        Parameters:
        n - the number of playerList
        Returns:
        true if the number of playerList is between 2 and 8, false otherwise

      • generateHTMLFile

        private static void generateHTMLFile(Player player,
                                     int playerIndex,
                                     java.lang.String directory)
        Generates HTML game files for solo play
        Parameters:
        player - the player requiring the game files
        playerIndex - index of the player
        directory - the directory of where to store the game files

      • generateHTMLFile

        private static void generateHTMLFile(Team team,
                                     Player[] playerList,
                                     int teamIndex,
                                     java.lang.String directory)
        Generates HTML game files for team mode
        Parameters:
        team - the team requiring the game files
        playerList - the list of players in the team
        teamIndex - the index of the team
        directory - the directory of where to store the game files

      • getColour

        static java.lang.String getColour(char tileType)
        Returns the HTML Colour value as a string
        Parameters:
        tileType - The type of tile uncovered
        Returns:
        green, blue, gold or (but should never return) grey.
